TopicTitle: With procedural wing editor open, cannot select the wing part individually

Articles.Content:
I noticed an issue while building a plane today (loving the new patch, by the by!). Not sure if this is new to this patch, or not, but here is the bug description:

When the procedural wing editor is opened, you cannot select the wing part individually (for example, using the Select tool or the Translate / Rotate tool). Screenshots in an Imgur album here.

Steps to reproduce:

Enter the VAB. Place a command pod and an attached fuselage / fuel tank. Then, place a wing part (this happens when using mirror symmetry or 1x symmetry, I have not tried it with other symmetry modes). Select either the Select tool or the Translate / Rotate tool. Notice that you can select the wing part and manipulate it individually.

Now, open the procedural wing editor. Using the Select tool or the Translate / Rotate tool, notice that you cannot select the wing part individually. When trying to do so, you can only select its parent part(s).

 

Obviously this is not a high priority, as it's easy to work around (just close the wing editor). But I hope this helps y'all track down some weird bug.
